repository_metadata.label: Repository metadata
repository_metadata.description: Basic information about repositories without access to file contents.

repository_contents.label: Repository contents
repository_contents.description: Files, commits, and other source code content within repositories.

collaboration_workflow.label: Collaboration & workflow
collaboration_workflow.description: Issues, pull requests, reviews, comments, and collaboration features.

automation_ci_cd.label: Automation, CI/CD & configuration
automation_ci_cd.description: Build automation, workflows, deployments, and related configuration.

security_alerts.label: Security alerts
security_alerts.description: Security findings such as code scanning, Dependabot, and secret scanning alerts.

packages_artifacts.label: Packages & artifacts
packages_artifacts.description: Published packages, build artifacts, and related metadata.

organization_access.label: Organization-level access
organization_access.description: Permissions that apply across an organization rather than individual repositories.

user_account_data.label: User account data
user_account_data.description: User profile information and account-level data.

unknown.label: Unclassified permissions
unknown.description: Permissions not yet classified by PermLens.
